title: ICE from rustc_query_impl/on_disk_cache.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust Sorry, not doable this time. ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.55.0 (c8dfcfe04 2021-09-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: c8dfcfe046a7680554bf4eb612bad840e7631c4b commit-date: 2021-09-06 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.55.0 LLVM version: 12.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/on_disk_cache.rs:890:14 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/on_disk_cache.rs:890:14 stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt
